website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight, easy-to-use heater is perfect for heating indoor areas.
pros: Easily turns on and adjusts with help from the automatic igniter
Comes with safety features such as an automatic shutoff switch and protective cage that won't get hot
1.2-gallon capacity provides up to 14 hours of heat
cons: Although it is listed as indoor/outdoor, it really works best for indoor settings

customer_reviews.title: Its still going strong! No problem noted....its another heating season!
customer_reviews.text: The end of the first day with this amazing heater. It operated 10 hours and still had 1/4 tank of fuel. Ofcourse the tank was full, not simply to full Mark. This morning it held less than a gallon. Heats just fine. Temp outside this morning is 14. The utility company here says a 1500 watt space heater uses about $90.00 a month above and beyond standard regular usage. This heater uses about $2.00 a day a savings of $30.00 a month other than cost. Good savings in the long run. I expect good use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: TLAK

customer_reviews.title: This Heater Works!  The Wick Adjustment is not Good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking heater and just the right size for the space I wanted to use it for but...when the wick is all the way up it still isn't high enough to burn the kerosene efficiently enough to keep the strong fumes from accumulating. Also there was some huffing of the flame which I was able to eliminate by moving the globe back and forth. I am using the 4.99 a gallon K1 kerosene that says for indoor use. That's 2.00 more than what I put in my car. So...maybe I just got a bad one but wanted to let you know my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Doe

customer_reviews.title: My mom said this is very good buy, it is keeping us warm in cold nights
customer_reviews.text: Awesome heater, especially it has removable fuel tank. Easy to refuel, easy to clean and not messy. Heat output is very good and one directional. Only thing I don't like about is top of heater never get hot enough to cook anything, only good enough to keep coffee pot or hot coco warm. The heat shield doing it's job too well. Will have some smell of kerosene at start of lighting or turn off, just make sure to have good ventilation when use it. Overall it is very good, I plan to take it for car camping soon and it will be good for emergency as well.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine at first
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine at first. Only used for about 1 hour. Second night, turned it on and could not control wick height. Anytime I tried adjusting lower, it would shut off completely. I contacted customer service who told me someone would call me back. No one did. I sent an email, no response after 12 days. Would give zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a tractor in your living room.
customer_reviews.text: SMELLS! I have other kerosene heaters that do not smell at all, this one is definitely not burning the kerosene efficiently. The burner never got red all the way to the top either. This was the case for 2 heaters.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I've used other heaters, not my first rodeo w/ a K2 radiant heater. This one doesn't put out the heat I'm familiar with, but that's moderately OK, my gripe is it STINKS badly compared to other heaters I've used. I've tried K2 from various sources to no avail, so I only use it when there is no alternative. Indoors? NO, I won't use it in the house, but I've used other brands (Senguko) with no where near the odor of this one. If you have a very leaky hunting hut or a tent, it might be OK for that, but not what it's claimed for.
customer_reviews.author: angler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Warmth. Easy to Use. We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: We just wanted to have a backup heater in case the power went out in an ice storm. After doing some research I decided to go with this Sengoku Heatmate. I am definitely glad we chose this model. It puts out amazing heat. It is virtually tip-proof. No matches needed as it has battery ignition switch. It burns clean. Yes, when it is ignited, there may be a kerosene odor for about 5 minutes. Otherwise it doesn't stink like older, less efficient stoves. The heat is very warm. Central heat is not a heat you can stand in front of and get warm....This heater is deliciously warm. Ahhh.
customer_reviews.author: R L Kelly

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have owned kerosene heaters for the last 25 years and this is hands down the best I ever owned. Fair warning: it is 10,000 BTUs NOT 23,000 BTUs so it will not heat as big a space, but it will heat a space the size of a large living room quite well at half the cost of the bigger ones. All night (10 hours) it uses less than one gallon of kerosene.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: Only good for a very small room or a hand warmer in the open.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for a small room with no draft. Other wise it is basically just a hand warmer. If you have it right next to you in a cold garage it will heat up your body that is right next to it. It works for what I wanted it for so no complaints from here. Just don't get your hopes up on its radiant claims. The tank is built in so you don't have to monkey around with filling a separate tank and then putting it in. Those types just look like a big fire hazard to me.
customer_reviews.author: beetle_X

customer_reviews.title: Bought to combat bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Have a small infestation of bed bugs and have tried nearly everything. Read online heating up the room to 110-120 F degrees would kill the bugs and eggs, after an extended period of time. The room is aprx 175 sq ft. This heater could not do the job, even at 10,000 BTUs. By itself, in a small space, I was only able to get up 98-100 F degrees. I ended up adding 3 electric heaters and was about to get heat up room to 115 F degrees. Its easy to use, heavy and should come in handy to heat the shop in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: FACTORY WICK
customer_reviews.text: Either this heater was manufactured out of spec or AW4E wicks are not to spec...Having a hard go at finding a wick that allows the control lever to move without pounds of force... NEED a thinner wick. Replaced heater twice ..asking for a refund....Heater burned great when there were no problems of safety shutoff and control lever..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sengoku OR-77
customer_reviews.text: This heater was well packaged and easy to assemble. The electric ignitor always works. The radiant heat feels nice. I use this in a shed and basement. This is a nice supplementary or back-up heater and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: This Heater is Absolutely Awesome. Until the Off Switch completely fails.
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: I bought this heater in January 2013. It is November 25th 2014 (third heating season in use) and the Manual Shutoff switch, safety tank removal shut off switch, and I assume the tip sensor switch all failed completely. Clearly there is a single point of failure for all three systems. I cannot shut off the heater. I have to let it burn through what is in the bottom tank. Huge safety failure, and just two years after purchase. I can no longer recommend this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse CreateThis

customer_reviews.title: Heats about 1000^2 well
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 convection kerosene heaters and this radiant. This Heat Mate was recommended by Miles Stairs so I purchased it. Does an excellent job. It is not rated for it, but it does a good job heating my open living room of about 1000^2 feet. It will raise it about 4 degrees in 2 hours. It does have the typical kerosene odor at start-up and shut down, but I have never had nor been around a kerosene heater that is completely odor free in those situations. The best thing is that I am saving about $40 a month on my power bill.
customer_reviews.author: R. Michael Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Great heater.
customer_reviews.text: I already owned one HeatMate HMN-110 and wanted another one. The new one works just as good as the older one. The cats and dog love to lay in front of these heaters on chilly mornings and evenings.
customer_reviews.author: stuart bearden

customer_reviews.title: It's a different kind of heat.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a necessity, but a comfort item for us. It just makes the room feel better. It also keeps the house heat from running as much, but IDK if it's a savings or not. Good heater
customer_reviews.author: E. V. R. Arnold Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Radiant-No fan or blower.
customer_reviews.text: Worked to take the chill out of a 16x20 garage. It's a radiant heater, so it takes a while to move the air around. I put a box fan 6" above it to help circulate the air.
customer_reviews.author: Bobs stuff

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, good heater
customer_reviews.text: We liked the first one so much that we bought a second. They are small enough to not be in the way in rooms or hallways. The removable kero tank means you can leave the spill and smell outside, and not have to lug the whole heater outside. These units start fast, run long and provide plenty of heat. We have these 2 and a wood stove in our 2 story house. Good value. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Good heater, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, puts out a lot of heat. Don't forget to crack a window as it puts out just enough exhaust to make a big stink.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Powell

customer_reviews.title: Heat
customer_reviews.text: Works well for heating a small to medium sized area. Smokes more than I had planned, make sure you have the area well ventilated.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher C. Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I only used it for a bit to make sure it worked, I am in the beginning of summer, I then put in spot where it will remain until winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: Working great! This is my second one, the first one was great for many many years in fact still works for a back up.
customer_reviews.author: ghostwithin

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking unit
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit! Really ! Runs terrible it WILL stink you out. Out of the box not enough flame. Adjusted the wick to go higher. Did get a little more flame but STINK I own a 1921 Perfection heater using the same fuel and very little odor. I had hoped newer technology would work even better. NOPE don't waste your money..Not Happy
customer_reviews.author: oldguy

customer_reviews.title: Great for storm-stand by
customer_reviews.text: We were without electric for almost two weeks from storm sandy. None of the propane heaters I saw were safe for indoor use. This unit is. I light it and let it heat up in the garage, then after an hour then bring it into the house so the initial fumes from ignition are not present. The removeable tank makes filling much safer. I'm told that in other parts of the world, these things are in wide use. It's a great alternative to having you and your family go to sleep in a freezing cold house.
customer_reviews.author: exconsul

customer_reviews.title: Faulty igniter
customer_reviews.text: It took a week for the igniter to stop working. I called the customer service and the rep said I have to change the battery. I did use energizer batteries but it did not work. I returned the product to the seller. It is a total waste of time and money. Secondly you do smell the kerosene in the house when it burns.
customer_reviews.author: Gatekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Buy new wick before using.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, good output, but comes with terrible wick. Couldn’t use it, like breathing jet exhaust. Washed internals and replaced wick per other review, now it’s functional.
customer_reviews.author: bigD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kerosene heater
customer_reviews.text: Home heater, I have 3 of these and use them to heat my Los Alamos New Mexico in winter.
customer_reviews.author: Archimedes

customer_reviews.title: Provides plenty of heat.
customer_reviews.text: I love this heater. It heated my entire house.(1300 sq. Ft.)so warm and electric bill dropoedi strongly recommend this heater
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN LANCASTER

customer_reviews.title: GOOD HEATER
customer_reviews.text: I think that you shoud have a knob to for heart controle as I keep turne it off annd have to started it up agene
customer_reviews.author: ,Carole  Henderson

customer_reviews.title: This heat is not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I know how to work a kerosene heater I cut the heater down as low as I can but it still have fumes in the house all over my house it's not worth buying
customer_reviews.author: ronald walker

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: It is a small unit we are using for our home we have used several kerosene heaters never had a problem with the smell consistent we are always having to adjust the wick and have to let burn out every fill outside of course very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised but kerosene heaters are smelly
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints about the product itself. I was just surprised at how much kerosene heaters smell. It was really quite intolerable. I sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for our garage, husband spends a lot of time there and it keeps it nice and toasty.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Wick did not last more than 4 weeks. Had to buy new wick and take heater apart to install. Big inconvenience, should have lasted a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Denine Holmes

customer_reviews.title: ... replacing the original wick with the kero world 91009 like others have
customer_reviews.text: After replacing the original wick with the kero world 91009 like others have, this heater is almost as clean burning as my old Aladdin temp rite 9. I installed the new wick at the stock height and I'm using #1 diesel. The blue flame just reaches the top of the chimney with just a trace of yellow flame at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Robin

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It keeps my 900 sqft home warm on a 20 degree day. Its stinky on startup , its also Chinese I was hoping it was made somewhere else. It doesn't keep food warm on top if the power goes out. It does keep my place warm, and that's good enough .
customer_reviews.author: KayakWesty

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions and use high grade kerosene
customer_reviews.text: Tried to save some $$ by using a lower grade Kerosene. It SMELLS up the room with the low grade stuff. The booklet recommends the high grade...didn't see that until AFTER the smell!!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heater for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I have this in my workshop (shed) and it works great. The workshop is now my new man cave! In the winter I could never last out I the shed, too cold. Now I can spend all day getting things done w/o interruption. One tank full ( 1 galling) last at least 8 hours. Easy, easy lighting and adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: NotSoFast

customer_reviews.title: Radiant Kerosene Heater - HMN-110
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these items and both are exceptional heaters! They were shipped swiftly, packed professionally, and are simple to operate. Each has performed it's assigned tasks (heating up a room) flawlessly!! My only regret is that I didn't buy a couple more of them at the same time! They even seem to sip at the fuel; with constant daily use each tank (approx. 1 gallon) will last for 2 - 3 days. I am extremely satisfied and would highly recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J Adelsgruber

customer_reviews.title: Great heater for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I use #1 fuel oil and now smell unless I turn it off and I think Kerosene would too, but a lot more expensive. Great back up heat.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Perantie

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the wick is set too low
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the wick is set too low.. Never can get it to proper flame.. House still smells very bad from it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Full blast or nothing. No low setting.
customer_reviews.text: It's either full blast or nothing. Smells when starting up and shutting down. I miss my Aladdin Economy Cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Basement is now warm and toasty using this heater. We are very satisfied with our purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: I do love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to supplement my heating costs. I live in an older home not drafty but the walls always felt cold. The rooms never really felt warm because of that. I run the Heat mate a few hours in the am, afternoon then in the evening. It really has made a difference in comfort. I have a fan in the hall to draw the heat to the rooms at that end and it really helps. We have not had extreme temps yet, but down in the 20's so far very pleased with this product. I am averaging 15hrs of use on a tank of fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Linda wasilonski

customer_reviews.title: It keeps shutting off
customer_reviews.text: It gives good heat , but keeps shutting off after 15 minutes..i relit several times then gave up..im not happy
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Hebert

customer_reviews.title: So glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: So glad I made this purchase. Easy to use and works like it says. Great back up if power goes out or nice to us on a very cold nite. Use only as instructions state and you can't go wrong with this heater...A 1
customer_reviews.author: edward byrum

customer_reviews.title: Poor excuse
customer_reviews.text: Wick burns up way to fast .... I’ve replaced the wick 5 times in 6 weeks of use . I will never buy this product again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It is worth every penny. I use it in my fireplace heath. It gets my entire home warm. I wish I could give it more than five stars! This is a very wise investment. You will be very grateful you purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Received badly damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, Ive had several. But this one was received badly damaged. The top was all dented in and the only reason Im not returning it is because the temps are in the low 20's and I need it
customer_reviews.author: jeff davis

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: It has been used only one season as of now but it works fine. It's odorous upon light-up and shut-off but I have personally never had a kerosene heater that wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: xxtragg

customer_reviews.title: Kept our large great area warm (its about 24x24) during an ice storm ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept our large great area warm (its about 24x24) during an ice storm when temps were below 0 so I would say this works great, was easy to use, and did not fail us once!
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: Work good
customer_reviews.text: Heating. I have 3 of the round heaters & 1 rectangle heater. Glad to have them thanks
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B McDonald

customer_reviews.title: outstanding little heater and Ace Hardware excellent
customer_reviews.text: ordered this heater and it was delivered standard shipping after approval within 1 week via UPS.Ace Hardware is outstanding,I am impressed.I live in Maine in an apt and my landlord cuts the heat May-Nov.At 10,000 btu's this heater kills the evening chill.It gets down to 40 degrees at night into June,winter in Maine is basically 9 months a year.Read directions carefully,use correct kerosene and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: david tomany

customer_reviews.title: Great heater for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I use this heater to heat parts of my house in the winter to save money. It heats very well and uses VERY LITTLE FUEL! I am amazed at how long this heater runs on a tank of kerosene. It is a great little heater!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: In fairness these OR-77 heaters are generally a good buy, the biggest problem is trying to return ...
customer_reviews.text: This OR-77 was VERY poorly manufactured, while my old one worked perfectly until it rusted out, this one is a fight........the carb sits about 2.5 inches too high,,, so I'll have to make my own wick for it !!!! In fairness these OR-77 heaters are generally a good buy, the biggest problem is trying to return one to China and return @ 10 weeks each way ,,,,, the winter would be over by the time I could get it repaired ! It's just faster and cheaper to fix it myself BUT I DO NOT recomend that people try to fix it themselves they may just blow themseves up !!!
customer_reviews.author: John Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Not fume free
customer_reviews.text: It's not fume free as they advertise. Not at all
customer_reviews.author: Tanya L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this. Used it one night. Have to send it back. Wick wouldn’t adjust.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE ARMSTRONG

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love how long it last...You'll be very happy with it...Very dependable, and puts out a lot of heat. For the price, can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Troopie

customer_reviews.title: heat
customer_reviews.text: Love heats room quickly easy to carry to different rooms. Kerosene is hard to find have to buy from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Razberi

customer_reviews.title: awesome heater! great for a small room
customer_reviews.text: awesome heater! great for a small room! stays cool on the sides and top, and is safe and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: lorenj2009

customer_reviews.title: Not so great!
customer_reviews.text: Well, after two months of use, the heater was difficult to turn off, until one night it wouldn't turn off at all. I carried it outside, pulled out the fuel tank, and let it burn out. I called customer service, and the gentleman told me to take the cover off and look for broken parts. When I removed the cover, it appeared nothing was broken, but what we saw was a cheap plastic catch for the metel shut off lever, which seemed to have worn out. Seriously, metal hitting against plastic......how long will that work? We returned the heater, and purchased the Sengoku OR-77 model, hoping it was a more durable model. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: NO reliability!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for someone and less than two months later, in midDec when helps area COLD, it quotes working!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewed by reader from onlinebookclub.com

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. But have strong smell while it is warming up and once it is turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R

customer_reviews.title: Great Heater
customer_reviews.text: If you keep the wick free of carbon build up (Burn the unit empty every 3 tanks) there is no smell and heat is great. These heaters smell some at start up and take down but once running they are great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scherer

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: heater arrived very quickly thankfully, it has been cold. I read the directions and waited the hour after I filled with fuel then fired it up. Heater works perfectly. I am very pleased, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: caretaker8

customer_reviews.title: arrives promptly
customer_reviews.text: works good. assembly was easy. puts out enough heat to keep the house warm, even on low.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Burr

customer_reviews.title: Bad odor
customer_reviews.text: When burning, it gives a bad odor. I have a Dura Heat kerosene heater, but never had a problem like this. I bought this because I wanted something smaller. I've had my Dura Heat for three years, and it still burns good.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Howell

customer_reviews.title: Very easy on the kerosene. 15 dollars worth will last 3 to 4 days
customer_reviews.text: It is worth every penny spent on it and would highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Spencer

customer_reviews.title: ... these heaters for different rooms and they both work great. There is a little more Kerosene smell than ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these heaters for different rooms and they both work great. There is a little more Kerosene smell than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have much luck...
customer_reviews.text: It's not as good as the larger model I have. It always smells and smokes and the wick needs to be replaced already. I'm not even sure that will help, though.
customer_reviews.author: Becky S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for power outages. My igniter did not work though, have a long lighter on hand just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heat Mate  Kerosene heater
customer_reviews.text: Actually works really good ,Quality made ,really like the removable fuel tank for re-fueling ,does run about 12 hrs. on the tank of fuel heater set on low .
customer_reviews.author: Dmiller

customer_reviews.title: grate
customer_reviews.text: we own a 1200 sq.ft. home it heats it nicely not over heating like the bigger units. I recomen it to everyone
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Hear Mate HMN-110 Radiant  Kerosene Heater 10000 BTUS
customer_reviews.text: Heater works great. Easy to assemble and a snap to use. Generates a good amount of heat and almost no fumes whatsoever on start up and shut down.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: works well minimal set-up
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, easy to set-up. Allowed the wick to absorb the kerosine for over an hour (1hr is recommended) and it lighted easily and only had a slight odor for a few minutes. would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: bamaman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little heater. Very powerful and easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice Small Heater, works great, the price is perfect. Very minimal smell upon start-up and shutoff. This is exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: The worse kerosene heater I ever messed with
customer_reviews.text: This product has multiple problems from the time you light it to the time you put it out. The worse kerosene heater I ever messed with.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice heater
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for taking the chill off without using much Kerosene. Leaving it on warms the family room real nice. One.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly518

customer_reviews.title: Heatmate Heater
customer_reviews.text: I chose this rating because the heater does just fine. About the only I can see that I don't like is the batteries give out on the igniter to quickly. But that's the case in most everything you buy. I would recommend this heater for it does the job it was designed to do. And 14 hours on a tank of fuel, pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Willard Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Great alternate heating
customer_reviews.text: This heater does a great job. I live on top of a mountain in North Carolina and sometimes it gets very cold at night. We fire up this heater to backup other sources of heat we have (electric, gas & Kerosene). It comes right out of the box with very little assembly, pull out the fuel tank fill it with k1 kerosene, hit the electric egnition and your off and running.
customer_reviews.author: Charles McDowell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected, delivered in a timely manner. Another quality online purchase from Amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kerosene heater at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great kerosene heater at a great price! Even more fuel efficient than operator's manual indicates it to be. No odor during operation. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Webber

customer_reviews.title: Very useful since I do quite a few outdoor activities
customer_reviews.text: Very useful since I do quite a few outdoor activities. Works very well on my Pontoon Boat when I go fishing during cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kerosene heater i have ever had. It runs a full 24 hours on one tank of fuel and heats very efficiently with very low fumes. I was kind of skeptical because the reviews were not great but i bought it anyway and i have not been disappointed. It is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Phat

customer_reviews.title: Like the 'lift out' fuel tank which is very similar ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the 'lift out' fuel tank which is very similar to my small monitor computerized vented heater. Front grill arrived bent & it took a little while to straighten out. I had a couple portable un-vented kerosene stoves years ago & finally threw them out as they were so old. Got this one for an un-heated 3 season porch. Occasionally I have things to do out there in winter and for yearly power failure in the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Catskhiker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Heater, Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: this little heater is awesome!!! i've never used a kerosene heater before so i am a real novice. this heater was very user friendly and simple to use...it fired up immediately without any smoke, fumes or odors and it quickly produced a nice, efficient blue flame. also noteworthy, i am able to heat my entire apartment using this heater and enjoying a more comfortable heat for half the cost when compared to electric heat. i highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chas Vic Jr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works great for a small room and the shipping was great
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Happily Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product does exactly what it says. I used this product in my kitchen, which is next to the (2) car garage, so it's always cold, well not any more since I purchase this kerosene heater, along with the additives, which don't work all that well, but this item is well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry L. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sputtered and flickered, never glowed or got warm. Back in the box after two days.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is a swell heater. Make sure you can find the wick and whatever when you need replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Lots oof heat and body does not get too hot on back. reliable except for igniter fouling. Smells a little on start up. Easy refill.
customer_reviews.author: Bas V

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: Great Heater. Vast improvement over my old greenhouse heaters but maybe it will provide a bit too much heat. Anyway we shall stay warm this winter
customer_reviews.author: Shynney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought to heat a porch. It gives a lot of heat and has a very long burn period on a tank. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Vistica

customer_reviews.title: Love This Little Heater
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little heater if you don't need to heat huge spaces. At 10K BTU it is powerful enough to heat my 640 sq ft basement to 75 degrees even with a crack in the window and outside tempreture of 30 degrees. If you use a good quality Kerosene such as Crown 1-K or a reputable K-1 Clear suitable for use in unvented Kerosene heaters, you get virtually no odor from this heater. Adjust the flame correctly and it is a sweet burner for sure. I may use this one regularly to knock the chill off on those extra cold nights. I would recommend this heater.
customer_reviews.author: DaGoatRancher

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband wanted to use to heat the garage this winter when he did little projects.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A. Imel

customer_reviews.title: ... wick doesn't come up enough mabey installed wrong or bad it want to smell eighter need to be raised ...
customer_reviews.text: for some reason the wick doesn't come up enough mabey installed wrong or bad it want to smell eighter need to be raised or isn't good
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS L FRYE

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as emergency heating source for small living area
customer_reviews.text: well made, light weight, simple to operate. Excellent addition of safety bars at the base. Easy assembly, good instructions. will probably purchase a second one soon
customer_reviews.author: Anne Barney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done well and easy to understand. Perfect for any home. Very happy with this product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Weezeapple

customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MY THIRD HEATER FROM THIS MANUFACTURER! MY OTHER TWO ARE CALLED KERO HEAT BUT ARE IDENTICAL TO THIS ONE! THIS IS MY FIFTH YEAR USING THIS HEATER AND ABSOLUTELY LOVE THEM AND WOULD USE NOTHING ELSE! SUPERB PRODUCT! AAAAA+++++

product_meta.title: Sengoku HeatMate 10,000-BTU Portable Indoor/Outdoor Radiant Kerosene Heater, HMN-110
product_meta.description:
Style Name:RadiantOur newest style Radiant Kerosene Heater (10,000 BTU) is safe and easy to use and economical to operate. It is great alternative heating source and excellent emergency heating source in events of power failure – no electricity is required! It provides efficient zone heating: about 380 sq.ft. It is lighter than other radiant models and it’s larger (1.2 gallons) tank will keep you warm for up to 14 hours. As energy costs sky rocket and temperatures plunge, HeatMate heaters provide an economical alternative way to zone heat your home or other indoor space. HeatMate heaters are self contained and operate without the need for electrical power. Combined with portability and ease of use this makes HeatMate heaters an excellent solution to your emergency heating needs. Provides warmth and comfort even in the coldest indoor spaces. Fuel gauge, siphon pump and batteries included.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
With over 60 years of experience, Sengoku has become a global leading manufacturer of alternative heating products. Everything that we design and develop is with a focus on continuing to exceed the industry’s quality standards and saving money for our customers. Our kerosene heaters offer the top features customers expect - safety features such as automatic shut-off and safety grills. Our heaters offer convenient features like easy-read fuel gauges and automatic ignition for fast, push-button starting. Our products are innovated to incorporate and meet the priorities and demands of today's consumers.
feature_bullets: Perfect for emergency heating or zone heating of rooms up to 380 square feet
The large capacity 1.2 gallon/4.5 liter fuel tank will keep you warm for up to 14 hours on one fill
Features an automatic safety shut off, easy push button start (no matches or electricity required), EZ Flame adjuster, tip over switch, and protective safety grills.
This Heater is suitable for use inside the house, poorly insulated buildings, garages and other hard to heat spaces.
Ideal for both everyday supplemental heating and emergency situations

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
